alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Blowing dust will impact portions of western Armstrong, Randall, southwestern Carson, southeastern Oldham and southern Potter Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow from thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Vega to 3 miles northeast of Wildorado to 4 miles southeast of Bushland to Canyon to 5 miles west of Happy. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will result in reduced visibility and hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Vega, Lake Tanglewood, Bushland, Wayside, Valley De Oro, Boys Ranch, Washburn, Wildorado, Palo Duro Canyon, Mescalero Park and Timbercreek Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Those out driving should stay alert for rapidly changing visibility due to blowing dust.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
